mapper.select: select * from TourSight where name LIKE #{name};

SELECT *, (6371 * acos(cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(lat))*cos(radians(lng) -radians(#{lng}))+sin(radians(#{lat}))*sin(radians(lat)))) AS distance FROM TourSight HAVING distance <= #{range} ORDER BY distance;
